text: Clash Royale is a freemium real-time strategy game developed and published by Supercell (video game company) The game combines elements from collectible card games, tower defense games, and multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) games. The game was released globally on March 2, 2016. It reached $1 billion in revenue in less than 1 year. This game includes upgrading your cards and battling other players to reach victory. ==Awards and nominations== Date Awards Category Result May 19, 2016 Google Play Awards Best Game December 1, 2016 The Game Awards Best Mobile/Handheld game April 6, 2017 British Academy Games Awards AMD eSports Audience Award March 15, 2016 International Mobile Gaming Awards Best Upcoming Game February 28, 2017 Best Multiplayer Game March 1, 2017 Game Developer Choice Awards Best Mobile/Handheld Game March 16–18, 2017 SXSW Gaming Awards Mobile Game of the Year April 27, 2017 Finnish Game Awards The Small Screen Game of the Year 2016 The Main Award – The Finnish Game of the Year 2016 May 17–19, 2017 Nordic Game Awards Nordic Game of the Year – Small Screen Nordic Game of the Year April 12, 2018 British Academy Games Awards Evolving Game April 4, 2019 British Academy Games Awards EE Mobile Game of the Year ==References== Category:2016 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Esports games Category:Free-to-play video games Category:IOS games Category:Multiplayer online games Category:Strategy video games Category:Video game spin-offs Category:Supercell (video game company) games
title: Clash Royale
